--- title: 'Week 1A: Data Visualization: Grammar of Graphics' format: revealjs: incremental: true --- ## ![](s1.png) ## ![](s2.png) ## ![](s3.png) ## ![](https://hellor.netlify.app/slides/SmallChange.gif) [click here](https://hellor.netlify.app/slides/SmallChange.gif) ## Grammar ::: {layout-ncol=2} ### English - Nouns - Article - Adjective - Verb - Adverb - Proposition ### Graphics ::: ## Grammar - Example :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} **English** The little monkey hangs confidently by a branch. ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} **Graphics** ::: {.cell execution_count=1} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-2-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ``` ``` ::: ::: ::: :::: ## Grammar - Example :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} **English** Article: The Adjective: little Noun: monkey Verb: hangs Adverb: Confidently Proposition: by Noun: a branch ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} **Graphics** ::: :::: ## Graphics - Grammar components ::: {.panel-tabset} ### Plot ::: {.cell fig-height='8' fig-width='12' results='asis' execution_count=2} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-3-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ``` ``` ::: ::: ### Code ```python import pandas as pd import numpy as np from plotnine import * from plotnine.data import * %matplotlib inline ( ggplot(economics, aes(x='date', y='uempmed')) + geom_line() ) ``` ::: ## `geom_line` ::: {.panel-tabset} ### Plot ::: {.cell execution_count=3} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-4-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3} ``` ``` ::: ::: ### Code ```python import pandas as pd import numpy as np from plotnine import * from plotnine.data import * %matplotlib inline ( ggplot(economics, aes(x='date', y='uempmed')) + geom_line() ) ``` ::: ## `geom_point` ::: {.panel-tabset} ### Plot ::: {.cell execution_count=4} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-5-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4} ``` ``` ::: ::: ### Code ```python import pandas as pd import numpy as np from plotnine import * from plotnine.data import * %matplotlib inline ( ggplot(economics, aes(x='date', y='uempmed')) + geom_point() # line plot + labs(x='date', y='median duration of unemployment, in week') ) ``` ::: # Making your first plot with `plotnine` ## Data Date: data to be plotted ![](ggplotaes/data.PNG) ## Packages ::: {.cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd import plotnine from plotnine import * from plotnine.data import * ``` ::: ## Dataset: `economics` ::: {.cell execution_count=6} ``` {.python .cell-code} economics.head(3) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=6} ```{=html}
date pce pop psavert uempmed unemploy
0 1967-07-01 507.4 198712 12.5 4.5 2944
1 1967-08-01 510.5 198911 12.5 4.7 2945
2 1967-09-01 516.3 199113 11.7 4.6 2958
``` ::: ::: ## Dataset: `economics` ::: {.cell execution_count=7} ``` {.python .cell-code} economics.info() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` RangeIndex: 574 entries, 0 to 573 Data columns (total 6 columns): # Column Non-Null Count Dtype --- ------ -------------- ----- 0 date 574 non-null datetime64[ns] 1 pce 574 non-null float64 2 pop 574 non-null int64 3 psavert 574 non-null float64 4 uempmed 574 non-null float64 5 unemploy 574 non-null int64 dtypes: datetime64[ns](1), float64(3), int64(2) memory usage: 27.0 KB ``` ::: ::: ## Dataset: `economics` ::: {.cell execution_count=8} ``` {.python .cell-code} economics['year'] = economics['date'].dt.year economics['month'] = economics['date'].dt.month ``` ::: ## Dataset: `economics` ::: {.cell execution_count=9} ``` {.python .cell-code} economics.info() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` RangeIndex: 574 entries, 0 to 573 Data columns (total 8 columns): # Column Non-Null Count Dtype --- ------ -------------- ----- 0 date 574 non-null datetime64[ns] 1 pce 574 non-null float64 2 pop 574 non-null int64 3 psavert 574 non-null float64 4 uempmed 574 non-null float64 5 unemploy 574 non-null int64 6 year 574 non-null int64 7 month 574 non-null int64 dtypes: datetime64[ns](1), float64(3), int64(4) memory usage: 36.0 KB ``` ::: ::: ## Dataset: `economics` ::: {.cell execution_count=10} ``` {.python .cell-code} economics.head(3) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=10} ```{=html}
date pce pop psavert uempmed unemploy year month
0 1967-07-01 507.4 198712 12.5 4.5 2944 1967 7
1 1967-08-01 510.5 198911 12.5 4.7 2945 1967 8
2 1967-09-01 516.3 199113 11.7 4.6 2958 1967 9
``` ::: ::: ## Tidy data ![](ggplotaes/tidy.png) - Every column is a variable. - Every row is an observation. - Every cell is a single value. ## Tidy data - Example ![](tidyr/tidyr1.png) ## Tidy data - Example ![](tidyr/tidyr2.png) ## Tidy data - Example ![](tidyr/tidyr3.png) ## Tidy data - Example ![](tidyr/longer_wider.png) # Grammar of Graphics - Plot 1 with `economics` ## Data ::: {.cell execution_count=11} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(data=economics) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-12-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=11} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Aesthetics: mapping variables ![](ggplotaes/aes.PNG) ## Aesthetics: mapping variables Aesthetic means “something you can see”. - position (i.e., on the x and y axes) - color (“outside” color) - fill (“inside” color) - shape (of points) ## Aesthetic: position ::: {.cell execution_count=12} ``` {.python .cell-code} from plotnine.data import mtcars ggplot(mtcars, aes('wt', 'mpg')) + geom_point() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-13-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=12} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Aesthetic: color ::: {.cell execution_count=13} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(mtcars, aes('wt', 'mpg', color='factor(cyl)')) + geom_point() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-14-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=13} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Aesthetic: shape ::: {.cell execution_count=14} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(mtcars, aes('wt', 'mpg', shape='factor(cyl)')) + geom_point() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-15-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=14} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Aesthetic: size ::: {.cell execution_count=15} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(mtcars, aes('wt', 'mpg', size='factor(cyl)')) + geom_point() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-16-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=15} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Data + Aesthetics ::: {.cell execution_count=16} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(economics, aes(x='date', y='uempmed')) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-17-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=16} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Geometrics Actual marks we put on a plot ![](ggplotaes/geom.PNG) ## Data + Aesthetics + Geometrics ::: {.cell execution_count=17} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(economics, aes(x='date', y='uempmed')) + geom_point() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-18-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=17} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Data + Aesthetics + Geometrics ::: {.cell execution_count=18} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(economics, aes(x='date', y='uempmed')) + geom_point(alpha=0.5) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-19-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=18} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Data + Aesthetics + Geometrics ::: {.cell execution_count=19} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(economics, aes(x='date', y='uempmed')) + geom_point(size=0.3) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-20-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=19} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Data + Aesthetics + Geometrics ::: {.cell execution_count=20} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(economics, aes(x='date', y='uempmed')) + geom_line() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-21-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=20} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Data + Aesthetics + Geometrics ::: {.cell execution_count=21} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(economics, aes(x='date', y='uempmed')) + geom_line() + geom_point(size=0.3) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-22-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=21} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Data + Aesthetics + Geometrics ::: {.cell execution_count=22} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(economics, aes(x='date', y='uempmed')) + geom_line() + geom_point(size=0.3, colour="blue") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-23-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=22} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Geoms ![](geoms.png) source: https://nbisweden.github.io/RaukR-2019/ggplot/presentation/ggplot_presentation.html#17 # Grammar of Graphics - Plot 2 with `mtcars` ## Dataset ::: {.cell execution_count=23} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=23} ```{=html}
manufacturer model displ year cyl trans drv cty hwy fl class
0 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 auto(l5) f 18 29 p compact
1 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 manual(m5) f 21 29 p compact
2 audi a4 2.0 2008 4 manual(m6) f 20 31 p compact
3 audi a4 2.0 2008 4 auto(av) f 21 30 p compact
4 audi a4 2.8 1999 6 auto(l5) f 16 26 p compact
... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ... ...
229 volkswagen passat 2.0 2008 4 auto(s6) f 19 28 p midsize
230 volkswagen passat 2.0 2008 4 manual(m6) f 21 29 p midsize
231 volkswagen passat 2.8 1999 6 auto(l5) f 16 26 p midsize
232 volkswagen passat 2.8 1999 6 manual(m5) f 18 26 p midsize
233 volkswagen passat 3.6 2008 6 auto(s6) f 17 26 p midsize

234 rows × 11 columns

``` ::: ::: ## Dataset: variable types ::: {.cell execution_count=24} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg.info() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` RangeIndex: 234 entries, 0 to 233 Data columns (total 11 columns): # Column Non-Null Count Dtype --- ------ -------------- ----- 0 manufacturer 234 non-null category 1 model 234 non-null category 2 displ 234 non-null float64 3 year 234 non-null int64 4 cyl 234 non-null int64 5 trans 234 non-null category 6 drv 234 non-null category 7 cty 234 non-null int64 8 hwy 234 non-null int64 9 fl 234 non-null category 10 class 234 non-null category dtypes: category(6), float64(1), int64(4) memory usage: 14.0 KB ``` ::: ::: ## Data ::: {.cell execution_count=25} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(mpg) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-26-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=25} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Data + Aesthetics ::: {.cell execution_count=26} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(mpg, aes(x='displ', y='hwy')) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-27-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=26} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Data + Aesthetics ::: {.cell execution_count=27} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(mpg, aes(x='displ', y='hwy')) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-28-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=27} ``` ``` ::: ::: displ - a car’s engine size, in litres. hwy - a car’s fuel efficiency on the highway, in miles per gallon (mpg) ## Data + Aesthetics + Geom ::: {.cell execution_count=28} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(mpg, aes(x='displ', y='hwy')) + geom_point() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-29-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=28} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Facets: small multiples Subplots that each display one subset of the data. ![](ggplotaes/facets.PNG) ## Data + Aesthetics + Geom + Facets ::: {.cell execution_count=29} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(mpg, aes(x='displ', y='hwy')) + geom_point() + facet_wrap("class", nrow=2) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-30-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=29} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Data + Aesthetics + Geom + Facets ::: {.cell execution_count=30} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(mpg, aes(x='displ', y='hwy')) + geom_point() + facet_wrap("class", nrow=2) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-31-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=30} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Statistics ![](ggplotaes/stat.PNG) ## Data + Aesthetics + Geom + Facets + Statistics ::: {.cell execution_count=31} ``` {.python .cell-code} ggplot(mpg, aes(x='displ', y='hwy')) + geom_point() + facet_wrap("class", nrow=2)+ stat_smooth(method = "lm") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-32-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=31} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Coordinate ![](ggplotaes/coord.PNG) ## Data + Aesthetics + Geometrics + Facets + Statistics + Coordinate ::: {.cell execution_count=32} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-33-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=32} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Theme ![](ggplotaes/theme.PNG) ## Data + Aesthetics + Geometrics + Facets + Statistics + Coordinate+ Theme ::: {.cell execution_count=33} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-34-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=33} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Scale ![](ggplotaes/scales.PNG) ## Data + Aesthetics + Geometrics + Scale ::: {.cell execution_count=34} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-35-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=34} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Data + Aesthetics + Geometrics + Scale ::: {.cell execution_count=35} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-36-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=35} ``` ``` ::: ::: ## Data + Aesthetics + Geometrics + Scale ::: {.cell execution_count=36} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](1_intro_files/figure-revealjs/cell-37-output-1.png){} ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=36} ``` ``` ::: ::: ##
